heading.heading: WRITE UI ONCE (JAVASCRIPT)
heading.description: on Web, Node (server side rendering), Native Mobile, Windows Universal, Mac, Linux..

columns.heading: Write once, run everywhere!
columns.description:
Build your cross-platform application that run almost everywhere with one single javascript code-base.
(Browser, Node.js server-side-rendering, iOs, Android, Windows Universal...)

columns.heading: Native and performant
columns.description: Unlike Cordova, Universal UI use React Native on iOs and Android build.. which close to Native Mobile application, it is much faster and easier to integrate with Native Mobile modules.

columns.heading: Universal components
columns.description: Universal UI give you all essential structure/components you need for Mobile or Web application, you don't have to waste time on picking from tons of library out there and make them work together.

series.title: Universal UI Fundamentals
series.description: In the first chapter, you’ll learn about the core concepts of Universal UI.

series.title: Advanced Universal UI (optional)
series.description: Read this chapter to get a broader understanding of the GraphQL ecosystem.
